Klasse DataTransportObject

java.lang.Object
quizlogic.DataTransportObject
Alle implementierten Schnittstellen:
Serializable
Bekannte direkte Unterklassen:
AnswerDTO, QuestionDTO, QuizSessionDTO, ThemeDTO, UserAnswerDTO
public abstract class DataTransportObject extends Object implements Serializable
Abstract base class for all Data Transfer Objects (DTOs) within the application logic layer.

This class provides common functionality shared by all DTOs, including:

  • Unique identifier management
  • Content-based equality and hashing logic
  • String representation for debugging
  • Validation support

Subclasses must implement abstract methods to define content-based comparison, hashing, string content description, and validation rules specific to their fields.

This class also implements Serializable to allow instances of DTOs to be serialized for storage or transmission.

Seit:
1.0
Version:
1.0
Autor:
Christos Poulios

  • Felddetails

    • serialVersionUID

      protected static final long serialVersionUID
      Serialization version UID for ensuring compatibility during serialization.
      Siehe auch:
      • Konstantenfeldwerte

    • id

      private int id
      The unique identifier for the entity this DTO represents.

      A default of -1 indicates the entity is new and has not yet been persisted.

  • Konstruktordetails

    • DataTransportObject

      public DataTransportObject()
      Default constructor creating a new (unsaved) DTO entity.

      The ID is initialized to -1 to indicate the entity is not yet persisted.

    • DataTransportObject

      public DataTransportObject(int id)
      Constructs a DTO representing an existing persisted entity with a known ID.
      Parameter:
      id - the unique identifier of a persisted entity

  • Methodendetails

    • getId

      public int getId()
      Returns the unique identifier of this DTO.

      An ID of -1 indicates the entity has not yet been persisted.

      Gibt zurück:
      the entity ID or -1 if not persisted

    • setId

      public void setId(int id)
      Sets the unique identifier of this DTO.
      Parameter:
      id - the unique entity identifier to assign

    • isNew

      public boolean isNew()
      Indicates whether this DTO represents a new (unsaved) entity.
      Gibt zurück:
      true if the entity ID is less than or equal to 0, false otherwise

    • isPersisted

      public boolean isPersisted()
      Indicates whether this DTO has been persisted.
      Gibt zurück:
      true if the entity ID is greater than 0, false otherwise

    • equals

      public boolean equals(Object obj)
      Compares this DTO with another object for equality.

      If both objects are new (unsaved), it compares their content using contentEquals(DataTransportObject). If both have IDs, it compares the IDs directly.

      Setzt außer Kraft:
      equals in Klasse Object
      Parameter:
      obj - the object to compare with this DTO
      Gibt zurück:
      true if both objects are equal based on their IDs or content, false otherwise

    • hashCode

      public int hashCode()
      Computes a hash code for this DTO.

      If the DTO is new (unsaved), it uses contentHashCode() to compute the hash based on its content. If it has an ID, it uses the ID for hashing.

      Setzt außer Kraft:
      hashCode in Klasse Object
      Gibt zurück:
      hash code based on ID or content

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns a string representation of this DTO.

      The format includes the class name, ID, and a summary of the main content fields as defined by getContentString().

      Setzt außer Kraft:
      toString in Klasse Object
      Gibt zurück:
      a string summary of this DTO's state

    • contentEquals

      protected abstract boolean contentEquals(DataTransportObject other)
      Template method for content-based equality comparison. This is called when both objects are new entities and have no IDs yet.
      Parameter:
      other - the other DataTransportObject to compare with
      Gibt zurück:
      true if content is equal, false otherwise

    • contentHashCode

      protected abstract int contentHashCode()
      Template method for generating a hash code based on the main content of this DTO. This is used when the DTO is a new entity.
      Gibt zurück:
      hash code computed from the main content fields

    • getContentString

      protected abstract String getContentString()
      Template method for generating a string description of the main content. This is used in toString() for representation purposes.
      Gibt zurück:
      a string summary of the DTO's main content

    • isValid

      public boolean isValid()
      Checks if the DTO content is valid.
      Gibt zurück:
      true if the DTO passes validate() without throwing an exception, false otherwise

    • validate

      protected abstract void validate()
      Template method for implementing validation logic in subclasses.

      Subclasses should override this method to:

      • Ensure all required fields are populated
      • Ensure values meet length or format constraints
      • Throw IllegalArgumentException if validation fails
      Löst aus:
      IllegalArgumentException - if validation fails
